message:
سؤال يا جماعة بعد اذنكوا  انا software developer   
5 سنين خبرة وعاوز اعمل shift career  وابقى presales engineer  ،، اية اللى مفروض اعملة او اتعلمة واوصل للشركات  ازاى واقدر ادور على وظيفة دى فين  ،، وفية حد ممكن يساعدنى انى اوصل  للمكان دا و الفلوس بردو هتكون بدايتها اية

data.message:
Interesting question. you should know that the career opportunity for pre-sales in Egypt is not as good as developer career path. A company with 100 developer might need one pre-sales.
I have to ask you first why you want to shift? do you have the sales skills? do you have a specific domain knowledge?

Generally speaking, pre-sales has the same salary range as developer, in some companies you get commission based on your achievements and in some companies they give you %of salary fixed and remain as variable based on your target achievement.

Im a corporate sales executive at Etisalat and have +5 of experience in sales at the telecom industry, beside I have been a software developer also for a while as well. Thats why im also interested in pre sales role.

Hany: no body move from sales to pre-sales; usually :)
do you sell Etisalat products like (voice service with corporate packages, handsets, loyalty benefits, handsets ,,etc) or you sell B2B services like (VoIP, Cloud services "IaaS, SaaS", Ethernet services ..etc) ?
What drives me to presales not only the sales experience but also the technical background.
Im selling voice,  data and  Solutions to SME, GOVERNMENT and Larg Accounts.

I am x-etisalat, currenly BSS/OSS Solution Architect and working with T1 CSP within EMEA. As part of my role I do pre-sales and support the sales/pre-sales guys.
To move to pre-sales role within Telco market, you must choose first which part of the stack, OSS or BSS, then which solution (customer care, billing, BI, Order Management, Rating, Inventory, Activation, Core Network ..etc)
and be able to sell a solution to a customer, proof that it works, do demos, PoC, workshops, training, RFx responses.
Earaky plz contact me, I will help you.
Mohamed Eraky ana asf eny natet kda f elpost bta3k, bs ana zayk bzabt, elmawdo3 da sha3'l baly.
